# fortipam Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "fortipam" {
  base_url     = "<FPAM_URL>"
  access_token = "<TOKEN>"
  verify_ssl   = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `access_token` (String) FortiPAM API user access token
- `base_url` (String) FortiPAM server URL https://192.168.1.99

### Optional

- `verify_ssl` (Boolean) FortiPAM API require verify SSL
